short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will only work for logged in users of http://uhendus-kristuses.com/. It adds an audio player to certain pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You will be able to use this extension if you are an authorized user of uhendus-kristuses.com.

An audio player is added to certain pages of the site so you can listen to a playlist without having to click each audio file separately.
